meanings.sent1: She did her durnedest to finish the race despite feeling tired.
meanings.sent2: The storm brought the durnedest winds we had ever seen.
meanings.sent3: The cat made the durnedest attempt to catch the laser pointer.
meanings.sent4: The durnedest mountain stood tall against the clear blue sky.
meanings.sent5: The durnedest roller coaster ride left everyone screaming with excitement.

meanings.definition: To try one's hardest or best
meanings.sent1: He durnedest to impress his boss with his presentation.
meanings.sent2: They always durnedest when it comes to helping their friends.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel durnedest to reach the bird feeder hanging high up.
meanings.sent4: She durnedest to make the perfect birthday cake for her sister.
meanings.sent5: The team durnedest to win the championship game.
